api_list.api_description: Retrieve parsed information about a user agent string using the GET method.

required_parameters.name: ua
required_parameters.description: The user agent string URL encoded.
required_parameters.default: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_15_5) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/89.0.4389.114 Safari/537.36

query: What is the estimated age of someone named John in the US and what detailed information can you provide about the user agent 'Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_15_5) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/89.0.4389.114 Safari/537.36'?
